name: Advameg
overview:
Advameg, Inc. is a fast growing Illinois-based company with a wide array of popular websites.

City-data.com reaches over 10 million uniques per month with its local services, such as a forum/social network with millions of posts, blogs, city information, user-contributed photos, business profiles, home value estimates, trip cost calculator, and more. ShareRanks.com aggregates people’s personal rankings of top items in different categories to create Internetâ€™s definitive top lists of things. Advameg’s Photo Dictionary defines words and phrases through user-submitted photographs. ReligiousForums.com is a popular discussion board with over 1,000,000 posts about all religions and philosophies. MusicBanter.com allows people to talk about all music genres and contains over 500,000 posts. NewSearching.com is a forum, car reviews, and encyclopedia search engine. Unit-Conversion.info allows instantaneous conversion between units and Currency-Conversion.info between currencies.

Advameg’s reference websites include NotableBiographies.com, MadeHow.com, NationsEncyclopedia.com, FilmReference.com, ScienceClarified.com, FashionEncyclopedia.com, ReferenceForBusiness.com, ChemistryExplained.com and more. They provide professionally written encyclopedic material and allow for user contributions.
